column4: G'day, I'm trying to install win98 on my computer which has ubuntu already on it, problem is that the win98 cd gets recongnized as bootable but wont boot (its a scsi cdrom) so im trying to make a floppy boot disk,  how do i format a floppy disk in msdos format and make it bootable ?
why on earth would you want to install windows 98 :/
use windows xp for games, its significantly better
